about_the_game:
《Story》


Even though she knows it's wrong… her hands won't stop…

"Ah… You're filming me… You're filming me acting so naughty with your phone…"

Even she can't believe that she's gotten this aroused just from being filmed.
Today, as usual, she relieved the sadness of her husband not being there by herself…

Until one day…
The caretaker of her apartment complex, Kaho Uehara, came to return her phone, which she had dropped.

"Your phone was unlocked when I picked it up. I didn't mean to look through it, but…"

"Um, well… if possible, I'd prefer that other people didn't…"

"I'm not shocked by this. If anything… I'm glad."

"Glad…? Why? About what?"
She smiles, seemingly pleased.

"Wouldn't you like to… join the alternative residents' council? You could just join as a trial at first. What do you think?"
She just left her that note and left, but… what should she do?
It's obviously a sketchy organization, so there's no way she should go… but.

《Character》


Setsuka Ikuta (VA: Shiina Asahi)
A young married woman who lives in an apartment complex.
Her husband is too busy to have sex, so she often pleasures herself.
She films herself masturbating with her phone to help herself get off, but she hasn't told anyone that.

*Before purchasing this product, we highly recommend that you play the demo [Japanese only] to check if the game works properly on your computer in your region.
*Appetite is the licensor of this game. For inquiries about the product, please contact Tensei Games.

《Contents》

  • 15 separate CGs (Over 80 CGs in total!)
  • 15 H-scenes
  • Japanese voice acting for the main female characters

《Features》

  • You can have the same experience as the protagonist.
  • Two endings
  • CG Gallery Mode
  • Scene Replay Mode

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains violence and sexual scenes. Within those, there are also scenes that are possibly interpreted as sexual violence, non-consensual sex, adultery, or an orgy. This game contains school sexual roleplay scenes, but all characters are adults. Please note that the heroine has a fetish for being filmed.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium4 / AMD Athlon64 and higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Over 800 x 600 resolution Over TrueColor (32bit)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectSound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2duo / AMD Phenom and higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Over 800 x 600 resolution Over TrueColor (32bit)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectSound

short_description: This is a Low-priced practical erotic game! A husband living far away for work. A wife who pleasures herself to deal with her sadness. That woman has a fetish for being filmed. One day, another person discovers her secret… and her hidden kink leads her to…!
